description.fr:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Subit {value:hpLoss,percent} de sa {%pvmax,plural:other} et gagne {value:arGain,percent} de son {%AT} en {%ar,plural:other}.
description.en:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Endures {value:hpLoss,percent} {%pvmax,plural:other} and gains {value:arGain,percent} of their {%AT} as {%ar,plural:other}.
description.es:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Pierde un {value:hpLoss,percent} de sus {%pvmax,plural:other} y gana un {value:arGain,percent} de su {%AT} en {%ar,plural:other}.
description.de:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Verliert {value:hpLoss,percent} seiner {%pvmax,plural:other} und erhält {value:arGain,percent} seines {%AT,plural:two}s als {%ar,plural:other}.
description.pt:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Sofre {value:hpLoss,percent} de sua {%pvmax,plural:other} e ganha {value:arGain,percent} de seu {%AT} em {%ar,plural:other}.

gameplayDescription.fr:
{PropertyEffect:28}\_: Plus vous avez mal, plus vous faites de dégâts\_!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AR}</color>\_: L'Armure permet d'encaisser les dégâts reçus\_!
gameplayDescription.en:
{PropertyEffect:28}: The more you hurt, the more damage you do!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AR}</color>: Armor lets you withstand damage!
gameplayDescription.es:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Cuanto peor estás, más daño haces.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AR}</color>: La armadura permite soportar mejor los daños recibidos.
gameplayDescription.de:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Je mehr Schmerzen du hast, desto mehr Schaden richtest du an!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AR}</color>: Dank der Rüstung kannst du den erlittenen Schaden einstecken!
gameplayDescription.pt:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Quanto mais você se machuca, mais danos você inflige!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AR}</color>: A Armadura permite suportar melhor os danos sofridos!
